channel.title: CVE Feed for createplugin -- WPMK Ajax Finder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for createplugin -- WPMK Ajax Finder

item.title: CVE-2022-1749|2024-08-03T00:16:59.918Z -- createplugin -- wpmk%20ajax%20finder
item.description: The WPMK Ajax Finder WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery via the createplugin_atf_admin_setting_page() function found in the ~/inc/config/create-plugin-config.php file due to a missing nonce check which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.0.1.
